verses.verse: וְהַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Now king דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> David זָקֵ֔ן <S%H2204><s%> was old בָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> [and] stricken בַּיָּמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> in years וַיְכַסֻּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3680><s%> and they covered בַּבְּגָדִ֔ים <S%H899><s%> him with clothes וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no יִחַ֖ם <S%H3179><s%> but he gat no heat לֽוֹ׃

וַיֹּ֧אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> said ל֣וֹ עֲבָדָ֗יו <S%H5650><s%> Wherefore his servants יְבַקְשׁ֞וּ <S%H1245><s%> unto him Let there be sought לַאדֹנִ֤י <S%H113><s%> for my lord הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> the king נַעֲרָ֣ה <S%H5291><s%> a young בְתוּלָ֔ה <S%H1330><s%> virgin וְעָֽמְדָה֙ <S%H5975><s%> and let her stand לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וּתְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> and become ל֖וֹ סֹכֶ֑נֶת <S%H5532><s%> and let her cherish וְשָׁכְבָ֣ה <S%H7901><s%> him and let her lie בְחֵיקֶ֔ךָ <S%H2436><s%> in thy bosom וְחַ֖ם <S%H2552><s%> may get heat לַאדֹנִ֥י <S%H113><s%> that my lord הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king

וַיְבַקְשׁוּ֙ <S%H1245><s%> So they sought נַעֲרָ֣ה <S%H5291><s%> damsel יָפָ֔ה <S%H3303><s%> for a fair בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> throughout all the coasts יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַֽיִּמְצְא֗וּ <S%H4672><s%> and found אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבִישַׁג֙ <S%H49><s%> Abishag הַשּׁ֣וּנַמִּ֔ית <S%H7767><s%> a Shunammite וַיָּבִ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> and brought אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> לַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> her to the king

וְהַֽנַּעֲרָ֖ה <S%H5291><s%> And the damsel יָפָ֣ה <S%H3303><s%> fair עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> [was] very וַתְּהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> became לַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king סֹכֶ֙נֶת֙ <S%H5532><s%> and cherished וַתְּשָׁ֣רְתֵ֔הוּ <S%H8334><s%> and ministered וְהַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to him but the king לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not יְדָעָֽהּ׃ <S%H3045><s%> knew

וַאֲדֹנִיָּ֧ה <S%H138><s%> Then Adonijah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חַגִּ֛ית <S%H2294><s%> of Haggith מִתְנַשֵּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> exalted לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> himself saying אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I אֶמְלֹ֑ךְ <S%H4427><s%> I will be king וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and he prepared ל֗וֹ רֶ֚כֶב <S%H7393><s%> him chariots וּפָ֣רָשִׁ֔ים <S%H6571><s%> and horsemen וַחֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men רָצִ֥ים <S%H7323><s%> to run לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> had never עֲצָב֨וֹ <S%H6087><s%> had not displeased אָבִ֤יו <S%H1><s%> And his father מִיָּמָיו֙ <S%H3117><s%> him at any time לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> in saying מַדּ֖וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> Why כָּ֣כָה <S%H3602><s%> after that manner עָשִׂ֑יתָ <S%H6213><s%> Why hast thou done so וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> again ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> he טֽוֹב־ <S%H2896><s%> man תֹּ֙אַר֙ <S%H8389><s%> be drawn מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> ? and he also [was a] very וְאֹת֥וֹ <S%H853><s%> יָלְדָ֖ה <S%H3205><s%> [man] and [his mother] bare אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> him after אַבְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H53><s%> Absalom

וַיִּהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become דְבָרָ֔יו <S%H1697><s%> And he conferred עִ֚ם <S%H5973><s%> with יוֹאָ֣ב <S%H3097><s%> with Joab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צְרוּיָ֔ה <S%H6870><s%> of Zeruiah וְעִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> and with אֶבְיָתָ֣ר <S%H54><s%> and with Abiathar הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וַֽיַּעְזְר֔וּ <S%H5826><s%> helped אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> and they following אֲדֹנִיָּֽה׃ <S%H138><s%> Adonijah

וְצָד֣וֹק <S%H6659><s%> But Zadok הַ֠כֹּהֵן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וּבְנָיָ֨הוּ <S%H1141><s%> and Benaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוֹיָדָ֜ע <S%H3077><s%> of Jehoiada וְנָתָ֤ן <S%H5416><s%> and Nathan הַנָּבִיא֙ <S%H5030><s%> the prophet וְשִׁמְעִ֣י <S%H8096><s%> and Shimei וְרֵעִ֔י <S%H7472><s%> and Rei וְהַגִּבּוֹרִ֖ים <S%H1368><s%> and the mighty men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who לְדָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> which [belonged] to David לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not הָי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲדֹנִיָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H138><s%> were not with Adonijah

וַיִּזְבַּ֣ח <S%H2076><s%> slew אֲדֹנִיָּ֗הוּ <S%H138><s%> And Adonijah צֹ֤אן <S%H6629><s%> sheep וּבָקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> and oxen וּמְרִ֔יא <S%H4806><s%> and fat cattle עִ֚ם <S%H5973><s%> by אֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> by the stone הַזֹּחֶ֔לֶת <S%H2120><s%> of Zoheleth אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אֵ֖צֶל <S%H681><s%> which [is] by עֵ֣ין רֹגֵ֑ל <S%H5883><s%> Enrogel וַיִּקְרָ֗א <S%H7121><s%> and called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> all his brethren בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> sons הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king's וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> the men יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah עַבְדֵ֥י <S%H5650><s%> servants הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king's

וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נָתָן֩ <S%H5416><s%> But Nathan הַנָּבִ֨יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet וּבְנָיָ֜הוּ <S%H1141><s%> and Benaiah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגִּבּוֹרִ֛ים <S%H1368><s%> and the mighty men וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלֹמֹ֥ה <S%H8010><s%> and Solomon אָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> his brother לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not קָרָֽא׃ <S%H7121><s%> he called

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake נָתָ֗ן <S%H5416><s%> Wherefore Nathan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בַּת־ שֶׁ֤בַע <S%H1339><s%> unto Bathsheba אֵם־ <S%H517><s%> the mother שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁמַ֔עַתְּ <S%H8085><s%> Hast thou not heard כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> doth reign אֲדֹנִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H138><s%> that Adonijah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חַגִּ֑ית <S%H2294><s%> of Haggith וַאֲדֹנֵ֥ינוּ <S%H113><s%> our lord דָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> and David לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> does not יָדָֽע׃ <S%H3045><s%> knoweth

וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> now לְכִ֛י <S%H1980><s%> come אִיעָצֵ֥ךְ <S%H3289><s%> give נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> please עֵצָ֑ה <S%H6098><s%> counsel וּמַלְּטִי֙ <S%H4422><s%> that thou mayest save אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשֵׁ֔ךְ <S%H5315><s%> thine own life וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> and the life בְּנֵ֖ךְ <S%H1121><s%> of thy son שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <S%H8010><s%> Solomon

לְכִ֞י <S%H1980><s%> Go וּבֹ֣אִי ׀ <S%H935><s%> and get thee in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto king דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> David וְאָמַ֤רְתְּ <S%H559><s%> and say אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about הֲלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אַתָּ֞ה <S%H859><s%> you אֲדֹנִ֣י <S%H113><s%> unto him Didst not thou my lord הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> O king נִשְׁבַּ֤עְתָּ <S%H7650><s%> swear לַאֲמָֽתְךָ֙ <S%H519><s%> unto thine handmaid לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Assuredly שְׁלֹמֹ֤ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon בְנֵךְ֙ <S%H1121><s%> thy son יִמְלֹ֣ךְ <S%H4427><s%> shall reign אַחֲרַ֔י <S%H310><s%> after וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> and he יֵשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> me and he shall sit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כִּסְאִ֑י <S%H3678><s%> seat וּמַדּ֖וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> how מָלַ֥ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reign אֲדֹנִיָֽהוּ׃ <S%H138><s%> has Adonijah

הִנֵּ֗ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold עוֹדָ֛ךְ <S%H5750><s%> are still מְדַבֶּ֥רֶת <S%H1696><s%> Behold while thou yet talkest שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> there with the king וַאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I אָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> I also will come in אַחֲרַ֔יִךְ <S%H310><s%> after וּמִלֵּאתִ֖י <S%H4390><s%> thee and confirm אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָרָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H1697><s%> thy words

וַתָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> went in בַת־ שֶׁ֤בֶע <S%H1339><s%> And Bathsheba אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king הַחַ֔דְרָה <S%H2315><s%> into the chamber וְהַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king זָקֵ֣ן <S%H2204><s%> old מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> was very וַֽאֲבִישַׁג֙ <S%H49><s%> and Abishag הַשּׁ֣וּנַמִּ֔ית <S%H7767><s%> the Shunammite מְשָׁרַ֖ת <S%H8334><s%> ministered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king

וַתִּקֹּ֣ד <S%H6915><s%> bowed בַּת־ שֶׁ֔בַע <S%H1339><s%> And Bathsheba וַתִּשְׁתַּ֖חוּ <S%H7812><s%> and did obeisance לַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What לָּֽךְ׃

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said ל֗וֹ אֲדֹנִי֙ <S%H113><s%> unto him My lord אַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> you נִשְׁבַּ֜עְתָּ <S%H7650><s%> thou swarest בַּֽיהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> by the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God לַֽאֲמָתֶ֔ךָ <S%H519><s%> unto thine handmaid כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Surely שְׁלֹמֹ֥ה <S%H8010><s%> [saying] Assuredly Solomon בְנֵ֖ךְ <S%H1121><s%> thy son יִמְלֹ֣ךְ <S%H4427><s%> shall reign אַחֲרָ֑י <S%H310><s%> after וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> and he יֵשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> me and he shall sit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon כִּסְאִֽי׃ <S%H3678><s%> upon my throne

וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> Now הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אֲדֹנִיָּ֖ה <S%H138><s%> And now behold Adonijah מָלָ֑ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigneth וְעַתָּ֛ה <S%H6258><s%> and now אֲדֹנִ֥י <S%H113><s%> and now my lord הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יָדָֽעְתָּ׃ <S%H3045><s%> thou knowest

וַ֠יִּזְבַּח <S%H2076><s%> And he hath slain שׁ֥וֹר <S%H7794><s%> oxen וּֽמְרִיא־ <S%H4806><s%> and fat cattle וְצֹאן֮ <S%H6629><s%> and sheep לָרֹב֒ <S%H7230><s%> in abundance וַיִּקְרָא֙ <S%H7121><s%> and hath called לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> all the sons הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king וּלְאֶבְיָתָר֙ <S%H54><s%> and Abiathar הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וּלְיֹאָ֖ב <S%H3097><s%> and Joab שַׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> the captain הַצָּבָ֑א <S%H6635><s%> of the host וְלִשְׁלֹמֹ֥ה <S%H8010><s%> but Solomon עַבְדְּךָ֖ <S%H5650><s%> thy servant לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> has not קָרָֽא׃ <S%H7121><s%> hath he not called

וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you אֲדֹנִ֣י <S%H113><s%> And thou my lord הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> O king עֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> the eyes כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of all Israel עָלֶ֑יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and לְהַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> [are] upon thee that thou shouldest tell לָהֶ֔ם מִ֗י <S%H4310><s%> who יֵשֵׁ֛ב <S%H3427><s%> them who shall sit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסֵּ֥א <S%H3678><s%> on the throne אֲדֹנִֽי־ <S%H113><s%> of my lord הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <S%H310><s%> after

וְהָיָ֕ה <S%H1961><s%> will come כִּשְׁכַ֥ב <S%H7901><s%> shall sleep אֲדֹנִֽי־ <S%H113><s%> Otherwise it shall come to pass when my lord הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲבֹתָ֑יו <S%H1><s%> with his fathers וְהָיִ֗יתִי <S%H1961><s%> will come אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I וּבְנִ֥י <S%H1121><s%> that I and my son שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon חַטָּאִֽים׃ <S%H2400><s%> shall be counted offenders

וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold עוֹדֶ֥נָּה <S%H5750><s%> was still מְדַבֶּ֖רֶת <S%H1696><s%> And lo while she yet talked עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> with the king וְנָתָ֥ן <S%H5416><s%> Nathan הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet בָּֽא׃ <S%H935><s%> also came in

וַיַּגִּ֤ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> And they told לַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> the king לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying הִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> Here נָתָ֣ן <S%H5416><s%> Behold Nathan הַנָּבִ֑יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> And when he was come in לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וַיִּשְׁתַּ֧חוּ <S%H7812><s%> he bowed לַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> himself before the king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with אַפָּ֖יו <S%H639><s%> with his face אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> to the ground

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <S%H559><s%> said נָתָן֒ <S%H5416><s%> And Nathan אֲדֹנִ֣י <S%H113><s%> My lord הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> O king אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> have you אָמַ֔רְתָּ <S%H559><s%> hast thou said אֲדֹנִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H138><s%> Adonijah יִמְלֹ֣ךְ <S%H4427><s%> shall reign אַחֲרָ֑י <S%H310><s%> after וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> and he יֵשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> me and he shall sit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כִּסְאִֽי׃ <S%H3678><s%> seat

כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for יָרַ֣ד <S%H3381><s%> For he is gone down הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day וַ֠יִּזְבַּח <S%H2076><s%> and hath slain שׁ֥וֹר <S%H7794><s%> oxen וּֽמְרִיא־ <S%H4806><s%> and fat cattle וְצֹאן֮ <S%H6629><s%> and sheep לָרֹב֒ <S%H7230><s%> in abundance וַיִּקְרָא֩ <S%H7121><s%> and hath called לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> sons הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> all the king's וּלְשָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> and the captains הַצָּבָא֙ <S%H6635><s%> of the host וּלְאֶבְיָתָ֣ר <S%H54><s%> and Abiathar הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְהִנָּ֛ם <S%H2009><s%> and behold אֹכְלִ֥ים <S%H398><s%> and behold they eat וְשֹׁתִ֖ים <S%H8354><s%> and drink לְפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> before וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> him and say יְחִ֖י <S%H2421><s%> God save הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king אֲדֹנִיָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H138><s%> Adonijah

וְלִ֣י אֲנִֽי־ <S%H589><s%> me עַ֠בְדֶּךָ <S%H5650><s%> But me [even] me thy servant וּלְצָדֹ֨ק <S%H6659><s%> and Zadok הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְלִבְנָיָ֧הוּ <S%H1141><s%> and Benaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוֹיָדָ֛ע <S%H3077><s%> of Jehoiada וְלִשְׁלֹמֹ֥ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon עַבְדְּךָ֖ <S%H5650><s%> and thy servant לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> has not קָרָֽא׃ <S%H7121><s%> hath he not called

אִ֗ם <S%H518><s%> lo מֵאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> אֲדֹנִ֣י <S%H113><s%> by my lord הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king נִהְיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> done הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> Is this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> has this וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> have not הוֹדַ֙עְתָּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> and thou hast not shewed אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> [עַבְדֶּיךָ כ] (עַבְדְּךָ֔ <S%H5650><s%> bondage ק) מִ֗י <S%H4310><s%> who יֵשֵׁ֛ב <S%H3427><s%> who should sit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסֵּ֥א <S%H3678><s%> on the throne אֲדֹנִֽי־ <S%H113><s%> of my lord הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <S%H310><s%> after ס

וַיַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then king דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> David וַיֹּ֔אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said קִרְאוּ־ <S%H7121><s%> Call לִ֖י לְבַת־ שָׁ֑בַע <S%H1339><s%> me Bathsheba וַתָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> And she came לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> presence הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> into the king's וַֽתַּעֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> and stood לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king

וַיִּשָּׁבַ֥ע <S%H7650><s%> sware הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֕ה <S%H3068><s%> [As] the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who פָּדָ֥ה <S%H6299><s%> that hath redeemed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> my soul מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all צָרָֽה׃ <S%H6869><s%> out of all distress

כִּ֡י <S%H3588><s%> surely כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> I נִשְׁבַּ֨עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> Even as I sware לָ֜ךְ בַּיהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> unto thee by the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> surely שְׁלֹמֹ֤ה <S%H8010><s%> Assuredly Solomon בְנֵךְ֙ <S%H1121><s%> thy son יִמְלֹ֣ךְ <S%H4427><s%> shall reign אַחֲרַ֔י <S%H310><s%> after וְה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> and he יֵשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> me and he shall sit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסְאִ֖י <S%H3678><s%> upon my throne תַּחְתָּ֑י <S%H8478><s%> Thahash כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> surely כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> so אֶעֱשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> in my stead even so will I certainly do הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַתִּקֹּ֨ד <S%H6915><s%> bowed בַּת־ שֶׁ֤בַע <S%H1339><s%> Then Bathsheba אַפַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H639><s%> with [her] face אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> to the earth וַתִּשְׁתַּ֖חוּ <S%H7812><s%> and did reverence לַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said יְחִ֗י <S%H2421><s%> live אֲדֹנִ֛י <S%H113><s%> Let my lord הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> David לְעֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And king דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> David קִרְאוּ־ <S%H7121><s%> Call לִ֞י לְצָד֤וֹק <S%H6659><s%> me Zadok הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> the priest וּלְנָתָ֣ן <S%H5416><s%> and Nathan הַנָּבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet וְלִבְנָיָ֖הוּ <S%H1141><s%> and Benaiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוֹיָדָ֑ע <S%H3077><s%> of Jehoiada וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> And they came לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> also said הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king לָהֶ֗ם קְח֤וּ <S%H3947><s%> unto them Take עִמָּכֶם֙ <S%H5973><s%> with אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> with you the servants אֲדֹנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H113><s%> of your lord וְהִרְכַּבְתֶּם֙ <S%H7392><s%> to ride אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> and cause Solomon בְנִ֔י <S%H1121><s%> my son עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַפִּרְדָּ֖ה <S%H6506><s%> upon mine own mule אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לִ֑י וְהוֹרַדְתֶּ֥ם <S%H3381><s%> and bring him down אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גִּחֽוֹן׃ <S%H1521><s%> to Gihon

וּמָשַׁ֣ח <S%H4886><s%> anoint אֹת֣וֹ <S%H853><s%> שָׁ֠ם <S%H8033><s%> there צָד֨וֹק <S%H6659><s%> And let Zadok הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְנָתָ֧ן <S%H5416><s%> and Nathan הַנָּבִ֛יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> him there king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> over Israel וּתְקַעְתֶּם֙ <S%H8628><s%> and blow בַּשּׁוֹפָ֔ר <S%H7782><s%> ye with the trumpet וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֕ם <S%H559><s%> and say יְחִ֖י <S%H2421><s%> God save הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <S%H8010><s%> Solomon

וַעֲלִיתֶ֣ם <S%H5927><s%> Then ye shall come up אַחֲרָ֗יו <S%H310><s%> after וּבָא֙ <S%H935><s%> him that he may come וְיָשַׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> and sit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כִּסְאִ֔י <S%H3678><s%> upon my throne וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִמְלֹ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> for he shall be king תַּחְתָּ֑י <S%H8478><s%> my place וְאֹת֤וֹ <S%H854><s%> for צִוִּ֙יתִי֙ <S%H6680><s%> in my stead and I have appointed לִֽהְי֣וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become נָגִ֔יד <S%H5057><s%> him to be ruler עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> over Israel וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> and over Judah

וַיַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered בְּנָיָ֧הוּ <S%H1141><s%> And Benaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהֽוֹיָדָ֛ע <S%H3077><s%> of Jehoiada אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <S%H559><s%> and said אָמֵ֑ן <S%H543><s%> Amen כֵּ֚ן <S%H3651><s%> Thus יֹאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> say יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֖י <S%H430><s%> God אֲדֹנִ֥י <S%H113><s%> of my lord הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king

כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> been יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> As the LORD עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲדֹנִ֣י <S%H113><s%> hath been with my lord הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> so [יְהִי כ] (יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> has been ק) עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <S%H8010><s%> even so be he with Solomon וִֽיגַדֵּל֙ <S%H1431><s%> greater אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כִּסְא֔וֹ <S%H3678><s%> his throne מִ֨כִּסֵּ֔א <S%H3678><s%> than the throne אֲדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> of my lord הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king דָּוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> David

וַיֵּ֣רֶד <S%H3381><s%> went down צָד֣וֹק <S%H6659><s%> So Zadok הַ֠כֹּהֵן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְנָתָ֨ן <S%H5416><s%> and Nathan הַנָּבִ֜יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet וּבְנָיָ֣הוּ <S%H1141><s%> and Benaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוֹיָדָ֗ע <S%H3077><s%> of Jehoiada וְהַכְּרֵתִי֙ <S%H3746><s%> captains וְהַפְּלֵתִ֔י <S%H6432><s%> and the Pelethites וַיַּרְכִּ֙בוּ֙ <S%H7392><s%> to ride אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> and caused Solomon עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פִּרְדַּ֖ת <S%H6506><s%> mule הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> upon king דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> David's וַיֹּלִ֥כוּ <S%H1980><s%> and brought אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and גִּחֽוֹן׃ <S%H1521><s%> him to Gihon

וַיִּקַּח֩ <S%H3947><s%> took צָד֨וֹק <S%H6659><s%> And Zadok הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קֶ֤רֶן <S%H7161><s%> an horn הַשֶּׁ֙מֶן֙ <S%H8081><s%> of oil מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאֹ֔הֶל <S%H168><s%> out of the tabernacle וַיִּמְשַׁ֖ח <S%H4886><s%> and anointed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon וַֽיִּתְקְעוּ֙ <S%H8628><s%> And they blew בַּשּׁוֹפָ֔ר <S%H7782><s%> the trumpet וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> said כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people יְחִ֖י <S%H2421><s%> God save הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <S%H8010><s%> Solomon

וַיַּעֲל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> came up כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> And all the people אַֽחֲרָ֔יו <S%H310><s%> after וְהָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> him and the people מְחַלְּלִ֣ים <S%H2490><s%> piped בַּחֲלִלִ֔ים <S%H2485><s%> with pipes וּשְׂמֵחִ֖ים <S%H8056><s%> and rejoiced שִׂמְחָ֣ה <S%H8057><s%> joy גְדוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> with great וַתִּבָּקַ֥ע <S%H1234><s%> rent הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> so that the earth בְּקוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H6963><s%> with the sound

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> that [were] with him heard אֲדֹנִיָּ֗הוּ <S%H138><s%> And Adonijah וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַקְּרֻאִים֙ <S%H7121><s%> and all the guests אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> for וְהֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like כִּלּ֣וּ <S%H3615><s%> [it] as they had made an end לֶאֱכֹ֑ל <S%H398><s%> of eating וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> heard יוֹאָב֙ <S%H3097><s%> And when Joab אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the sound הַשּׁוֹפָ֔ר <S%H7782><s%> of the trumpet וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> he said מַדּ֥וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> Why קֽוֹל־ <S%H6963><s%> Wherefore [is this] noise הַקִּרְיָ֖ה <S%H7151><s%> of the city הוֹמָֽה׃ <S%H1993><s%> being in an uproar

עוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <S%H5750><s%> was still מְדַבֵּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> And while he yet spake וְהִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> behold יוֹנָתָ֛ן <S%H3129><s%> behold Jonathan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֶבְיָתָ֥ר <S%H54><s%> of Abiathar הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest בָּ֑א <S%H935><s%> came וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲדֹנִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H138><s%> and Adonijah בֹּ֔א <S%H935><s%> unto him Come in כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man חַ֛יִל <S%H2428><s%> for thou [art] a valiant אַ֖תָּה <S%H859><s%> you וְט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good תְּבַשֵּֽׂר׃ <S%H1319><s%> tidings

וַיַּ֙עַן֙ <S%H6030><s%> answered יוֹנָתָ֔ן <S%H3129><s%> And Jonathan וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לַאֲדֹנִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H138><s%> to Adonijah אֲבָ֕ל <S%H61><s%> Verily אֲדֹנֵ֥ינוּ <S%H113><s%> our lord הַמֶּֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> David הִמְלִ֥יךְ <S%H4427><s%> king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <S%H8010><s%> hath made Solomon

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> hath sent אִתּֽוֹ־ <S%H854><s%> for הַ֠מֶּלֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צָד֨וֹק <S%H6659><s%> with him Zadok הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נָתָ֣ן <S%H5416><s%> and Nathan הַנָּבִ֗יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet וּבְנָיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H1141><s%> and Benaiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְה֣וֹיָדָ֔ע <S%H3077><s%> of Jehoiada וְהַכְּרֵתִ֖י <S%H3774><s%> and the Cherethites וְהַפְּלֵתִ֑י <S%H6432><s%> and the Pelethites וַיַּרְכִּ֣בוּ <S%H7392><s%> and they have caused him to ride אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and פִּרְדַּ֥ת <S%H6506><s%> mule הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> upon the king's

וַיִּמְשְׁח֣וּ <S%H4886><s%> have anointed אֹת֡וֹ <S%H853><s%> צָד֣וֹק <S%H6659><s%> And Zadok הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְנָתָן֩ <S%H5416><s%> and Nathan הַנָּבִ֨יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet לְמֶ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> him king בְּגִח֗וֹן <S%H1521><s%> in Gihon וַיַּעֲל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> and they are come up מִשָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there שְׂמֵחִ֔ים <S%H8056><s%> from thence rejoicing וַתֵּהֹ֖ם <S%H1949><s%> rang again הַקִּרְיָ֑ה <S%H7151><s%> so that the city ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> This הַקּ֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> This [is] the noise אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which שְׁמַעְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H8085><s%> that ye have heard

וְגַם֙ <S%H1571><s%> Besides יָשַׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> sitteth שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> And also Solomon עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסֵּ֥א <S%H3678><s%> on the throne הַמְּלוּכָֽה׃ <S%H4410><s%> of the kingdom

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> Moreover בָּ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> came עַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> servants הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And moreover the king's לְ֠בָרֵךְ <S%H1288><s%> to bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲדֹנֵ֜ינוּ <S%H113><s%> our lord הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king דָּוִד֮ <S%H1732><s%> David לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> saying יֵיטֵ֨ב <S%H3190><s%> better [אֱלֹהֶיךָ כ] (אֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> angels ק) אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֤ם <S%H8034><s%> make the name שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon מִשְּׁמֶ֔ךָ <S%H8034><s%> than thy name וִֽיגַדֵּ֥ל <S%H1431><s%> greater אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כִּסְא֖וֹ <S%H3678><s%> his throne מִכִּסְאֶ֑ךָ <S%H3678><s%> than thy throne וַיִּשְׁתַּ֥חוּ <S%H7812><s%> bowed הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּשְׁכָּֽב׃ <S%H4904><s%> himself upon the bed

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> has also כָּ֖כָה <S%H3602><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> And also thus said הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king בָּר֨וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> [be] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> which hath given הַיּ֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day יֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> [one] to sit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסְאִ֖י <S%H3678><s%> on my throne וְעֵינַ֥י <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes רֹאֽוֹת׃ <S%H7200><s%> even seeing

וַיֶּֽחֶרְדוּ֙ <S%H2729><s%> were afraid וַיָּקֻ֔מוּ <S%H6965><s%> and rose up כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַ֨קְּרֻאִ֔ים <S%H7121><s%> And all the guests אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> him לַאֲדֹנִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H138><s%> that [were] with Adonijah וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> went אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man לְדַרְכּֽוֹ׃ <S%H1870><s%> his way

וַאֲדֹ֣נִיָּ֔הוּ <S%H138><s%> And Adonijah יָרֵ֖א <S%H3372><s%> feared מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> because שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> and arose וַיֵּ֔לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went וַֽיַּחֲזֵ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> and caught hold בְּקַרְנ֥וֹת <S%H7161><s%> on the horns הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar

וַיֻּגַּ֤ד <S%H5046><s%> And it was told לִשְׁלֹמֹה֙ <S%H8010><s%> Solomon לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֲדֹ֣נִיָּ֔הוּ <S%H138><s%> Behold Adonijah יָרֵ֖א <S%H3372><s%> feareth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon וְ֠הִנֵּה <S%H2009><s%> behold אָחַ֞ז <S%H270><s%> for lo he hath caught hold בְּקַרְנ֤וֹת <S%H7161><s%> on the horns הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying יִשָּֽׁבַֽע־ <S%H7650><s%> swear לִ֤י כַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> unto me to day הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Let king שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon אִם־ <S%H518><s%> he will not יָמִ֥ית <S%H4191><s%> that he will not slay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַבְדּ֖וֹ <S%H5650><s%> his servant בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> with the sword

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon אִ֚ם <S%H518><s%> If יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> man חַ֔יִל <S%H2428><s%> If he will shew himself a worthy לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> of him fall מִשַּׂעֲרָת֖וֹ <S%H8185><s%> there shall not an hair אָ֑רְצָה <S%H776><s%> to the earth וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if רָעָ֥ה <S%H7451><s%> but if wickedness תִמָּצֵא־ <S%H4672><s%> shall be found ב֖וֹ וָמֵֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> in him he shall die

וַיִּשְׁלַ֞ח <S%H7971><s%> sent הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> So king שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon וַיֹּרִדֻ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3381><s%> and they brought him down מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> from the altar וַיָּבֹ֕א <S%H935><s%> And he came וַיִּשְׁתַּ֖חוּ <S%H7812><s%> and bowed לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> himself to king שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <S%H559><s%> said ל֥וֹ שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> and Solomon לֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go לְבֵיתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1004><s%> to thine house פ
